content.rendered:
1
Partners

We provide a wide range of partners the opportunity to work with us. Our Global Partner Program allows participants to extend their customer base and open new revenue streams in a rapidly changing finance industry, driven by blockchain solutions. 

Advisory

Define the structure of your offering with the help of one of our advisory partners

PwC
PwC is a global network of firms delivering world-class assurance, tax, and consulting services for your business.
Creatrust
Creatrust is a leading independent provider of corporate, fund and family office services to international clients who want to be established in Luxembourg.
AltfinPartners
AltfinPartners helps companies to define, structure and execute the most adequate financing strategies in a context of increased digitalization of finance.
Finimmo
Finimmo provides professional & corporate services to entities domiciled in Luxembourg. They specialize in servicing real estate & private equity.

Identity Partners

Validate investor participation by working with the leading providers of KYC & AML

IdentityMind (Acquired by Acuant)
Creates and analyzes digital identities, allowing identity proofing and RegTech identification while preventing identity fraud.
Onfido
The new identity standard for the internet. Onfido verifies people's identities using a photo-based identity document, a selfie and artificial intelligence algorithms.
Synaps
Synaps provides a universal, secure & reusable KYC. Synaps’ solutions let users manage & share their identity online in a safe way.
Sum&Substance
Sum&Substance is a developer of remote verification solutions. Their technology allows online services around the world to meet regulatory requirements, prevent fraud and enhance customer confidence.
telindus
Founded in 1979, Telindus Luxembourg supports all companies and public administrations in their digital transformation by providing them with holistic ICT and telecom solutions as well as tailor-made support services.
Cynopsis Solutions
Cynopsis Solutions was established in Singapore in 2014 and offers solutions designed to automate KYC processes. It has operations in Singapore, UK, Taiwan and Vietnam.

Liquidity Partners

Unlock and create a secondary market for your asset

Blocktrade
Blocktrade is a top-tier trading facility for Security Tokens, Crypto Assets, Crypto Traded Indices and other tokenised assets.
Archax
Archax is a new, institutional-grade exchange for trading asset-backed tokens (digital securities, security tokens, etc.). Archax offers a credible bridge between the blockchain world and the traditional investment space.
OpenFinance
OpenFinance gives access to new investment opportunities, diversifies your portfolio, and takes advantage of improved liquidity. Openfinance is the first U.S.-regulated platform for the secondary market trading of digital alternative assets.
DeltaBlock
Empower Liquidity for the Next Generation Of Capital Markets.
1xchange
1exchange (“1X”) enables a new way for private company shareholders to realize the value of their holdings, and for qualified investors to participate in private companies.

Securities Distributors

Drive investment for your offering

STO Filter
STO Filter provides you with information on new digital security and security token offerings amongst other industry related topics.
Havas Blockchain
Havas Blockchain is the Havas Group solution for crypto and blockchain projects.
STOscope
STOscope provides complete information about all Security Token Offerings (STOs).
area2invest
Europe's Marketplace for Securities and Token Issuances

Legal Partners

Ensure compliance by working with the most specialized security tokens lawyers

DLA Piper
DLA Piper offers a range of business advice, ranging from fund structuring, banking, private equity, insurance, corporate, tax and intellectual property and technology matters.
Gide 255
Gide 255 offers its clients a flexible method that aids brainstorming, decision-making, implementation and legal structuring as regards their digital strategy.
DS Avocats
Founded in Paris in 1972, DS now has close to four hundred business lawyers practicing in a network of 26 offices.
CMS
CMS focuses on helping you mitigate risk and benefit from innovation, enabling your business or organisation to thrive.
Fieldfisher
Fieldfisher is a European law firm with market leading practices in many of the world's most dynamic sectors.
Hashtag Avocats
Hashtag Avocats has developed cutting-edge expertise in supporting start-ups and growing companies.

Tech Partners

Connect with other players via high-quality security token events and security token communities

Polygon
Polygon is the first well-structured, easy-to-use platform for Ethereum scaling and infrastructure development.
Inveniam
Inveniam has built Inveniam.io, a powerful technology platform that utilizes Big Data, AI, and blockchain technology to provide not only surety of data, but high functioning use of that data in a distributed data eco-system.
Tangany
Tangany is a European whitelabel custody blockchain infrastructure for digital assets, coins and tokens.
Monerium
Monerium is a regulated e-money issuer on blockchains. Monerium enables individuals, companies and platforms to securely manage and automate the flow of money on and off blockchains.

Communities

Connect with other players via high-quality security token events and security token communities

MonacoTech
MonacoTech, as Monaco startup Center of Excellence, hand-selects committed, ambitious, innovative companies in line with the Prince’s Government strategy.
Global Digital Finance
Global Digital Finance brings together global experts to engage policy makers and regulators to advocate industry best practice.
Technology is changing how most businesses operate and there is nowhere more relevant than in this space where there is a need to find an effective efficient way of raising capital. By working with a digital tokenization provider like Tokeny, we can actually deliver a solution businesses need.
Martin BartlamPartner
DLA Piper
We are building a regulated, institutional market – based in London – for institutions to trade in credible, digital securities globally. As such we want to partner with leading firms like Tokeny, who are a key part of this emerging ecosystem, and tokenising assets that can then be listed and traded on our exchange.
Graham RodfordCEO
Archax
We are excited to partner with companies such as Tokeny — whose tokenization and issuance services are crucial elements — in supporting the establishment of a digital securities ecosystem that will completely revolutionize the way in which the value and ownership of any asset class are realized, accessed, and distributed on a global scale.
Darren MarbleCEO
Issuance
Since our founding we have helped companies identify the good guys – those they want to do business with, while avoiding the bad guys. Working together with Tokeny’s investorID standard, we bring these capabilities to investorID and with it, the required transparency, integrity and compliance.
Jose CalderaChief Products and Marketing Officer
IdentityMind

Become a Partner

Join a pioneering ecosystem in the next era of finance and benefit from Tokeny’s industry expertise.

[vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html]

How Can We Help?

We have resources that might relate to your inquiry. If you don’t find what you need, fill out our contact form.

Learn More About Tokenization 

Read Market Insights -->
Download Tokenization Ebook -->

Get Inspired 

Download Tokenization Case Study -->

Read Latest News

Visit Tokeny Solutions News -->

TRUSTED BY

Tokeny Solutions is the first and foremost innovative, competent and strong team that successfully manages tokens and primary issuances. There are strong parallels with our businesses in the capital markets.
